txt.en: The drake-corpse is warm to the touch. The creature has not been dead for long
Chapter 9.8: Karazgar Cornered
Talk to Vútro the West-wind in Karazgar's lair

'We need to learn what happened here. Go forward with caution, [placeholder], and I will follow behind. Worms of the Frost-horde or Karazgar himself may lie in wait for us, further ahead. I think we have cornered the Weeping Warrior in his lair, and a cornered animal is made more dangerous.\n\n'Remain alert for any threat, no matter what it might be!'
'DNT - Blah!'
Search the lair for some sign of Karazgar
'DNT - Blah!'

'I don't understand, [placeholder]. Where is Karazgar? It is clear from the butchery here that he engaged in battle with the Frost-horde that tracked him to his lair, but if he was the victor, as he seems to have been, then where has he gone?'
Search the lair for some sign of Karazgar
These drakes of the Frost-horde were slain by some sharp instrument

'Go forward with caution, [placeholder], and I will follow behind. Worms of the Frost-horde or Karazgar himself may lie in wait for us, further ahead. I think we have cornered the Weeping Warrior in his lair, and a cornered animal is made more dangerous.\n\n'Remain alert for any threat, no matter what it might be!'
You have come with Vútro the West-wind to a cavern in the Ered Mithrin that may have served as Karazgar's lair. But where is the Weeping Warrior now?
DNT - Blah!
Vútro the West-wind has asked you to search Karazgar's lair for some sign of the Weeping Warrior.
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
Vútro the West-wind has asked you to search Karazgar's lair for some sign of the Weeping Warrior.
DNT - Blah!
Vútro the West-wind has entered the large chamber at the rear of Karazgar's lair.
Search the lair for some sign of Karazgar
Search the lair for some sign of Karazgar
Vútro the West-wind has asked you to search Karazgar's lair for some sign of the Weeping Warrior.
Vútro the West-wind has asked you to search Karazgar's lair for some sign of the Weeping Warrior.
Judging from its injuries, this drake engaged in fierce battle before it was slain
Small piles of rust shine in the pale light of the cavern
Steam still rises from the blood, even in the cavern's cold air
The tunnel opens into a large cavern filled with the corpses of worms and drakes

'Go forward with caution, [placeholder], and I will follow behind. Worms of the Frost-horde or Karazgar himself may lie in wait for us, further ahead. I think we have cornered the Weeping Warrior in his lair, and a cornered animal is made more dangerous.\n\n'Remain alert for any sign of danger!'
